name: The Sapling Sage
description:
Play as a powerful mage as you fight to protect the tree that gives you your powers. Explore different areas, find ancient ruins, and fight formidable foes while you progress through the game building you defenses.

Make sure to explore the world while also protecting your tree at the same time! By exploring you can find bosses that you can defeat. When you defeat a boss the "Phase" if the game increases, and a new mob starts to spawn. After defeating a boss you will also gain a new spell and receive a lot of money.

Phases:

1 - Goblins (plains)

2 - Elves (dark forest)

3 - Cyclopes (mountains)

4 - Scorpions (desert)

5 - ALL OF THEM

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Move

Mouse - Aim

LeftClick - shoot

(rest of controls are in game)

Towers:

1 - Ward: Slows enemies down that are in it's radius

2 - Turret: Shoots nearby enemies

3 - Upgrade: By pressing 3 you permanently upgrade the level of the towers you place down.
